ingredient_combos.description: Ingredient combinations that should be merged into a single ingredient

combos.description: Merge Glucosamine and Chondroitin into combo product
Merge B1, B2, B6, B12 only if no other vitamins present
Merge Vitamin A and D only if no other vitamins present

high_level_category_mapping.description: Maps category to high-level category (PRIORITY VMS, NON-PRIORITY VMS, OTC, REMOVE)

rules.condition: category equals 'REMOVE' OR category is null/empty

rules.description: Sports nutrition and active lifestyle products

_notes.ingredient_combos: Combos are checked in order. If required_ingredients all match, they are merged into combo_name.
_notes.match_mode: 'contains' means substring match (e.g., 'glucosamine' matches 'GLUCOSAMINE HCL'), 'exact' means exact match
_notes.condition: 'no_other_vitamins' means only merge if no other vitamin ingredients are present
_notes.high_level_category: Rules are applied in priority order (1-4). First matching rule wins.
_notes.modification_instructions: To add a new combo, add a new object to the 'combos' array. To change high-level category logic, edit the 'rules' array.
